name: Ecommerce Menu – WooCommerce Widget
author: Samuel Silva

sections.description:
The best way to improve the Experience of e-commerce users is to focus on their needs.
With Ecommerce Menu, is possible to group all the links and important content from an E-commerce environment. With this plugin, you can show:

This plugin is a WooCommerce extension, WooCommerce is a required plugin for the extension works.

  1. A Welcome Message
  2. Featured Products (defined on wp-admin)
  3. Products in Cart (or a message if the Cart is empty)
  4. Cart Totals
  5. Checkout Call-to-action
  6. Cart and My Account Links
sections.installation:
1. Upload ecommerce-menu folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to WP-admin->Ecommerce Menu and find the settings panel

short_description: This plugin provides an Ecommerce Menu (WooCommerce extension) accessed by a widget on the Bottom right of your website.
